smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface ItemsDao is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Interface 'ItemsDao' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: v.getTag(VIEWHOLDER_TAG) cannot be safely cast to Long.
v.getTag(VIEWHOLDER_TAG) cannot be safely cast to Long.
rootView.findViewById(R.id.iedl_text) cannot be safely cast to EditText?.

smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function onOptionsItemSelected has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function areContentsTheSame has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function areItemsTheSame has 4 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.
